alert.note: Alert for Bay; Jackson; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 15 at 5:09PM EDT until May 15 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Jackson County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northeastern Bay County in the Panhandle of Florida... Southeastern Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 409 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles southwest of Marianna, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Vernon, Bradford, Cottondale, Alford, Wausau, Fountain, Singer Road, Union City, Gainer Spring, Porter Lake, Smyrna, Compass Lake, Sylvania, Betts, Orange Hill, Kynesville, Ridgetop, Steele City, Gilberts Mill and Round Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
